modelDetails.description:
Shinrai Prime

The Shinrai Prime Series excavator is designed and manufactured for working in granite, marble quarrying and other heavy duty applications. Retaining the ruggedness, a variant of the machine has been made for bulk excavation as well

Specs:

Engine power: 250 PS
Operating Weight: 35400 KG
Bucket Capacity: 1.30 m³ - 2.5 m³

Shinrai Prime - Control Valve:

Excellent hydraulic system to ensure optimum utilization of hydraulic and engine power.

Shinrai Prime - Backhoe Valve:

Excellent hydraulic system to ensure optimum utilization of hydraulic and engine power.

Shinrai Prime - Transmission:

Electronically controlled parameters for optimized performance and increased life.Proven transmission axle drive for top notch performance.
